description:
**Target**: Adjacent ally

**Duration**: Until the start of your next turn or until expended

Target can choose to gain advantage on one roll or ready an action to Defend
title: Aid

description:
**Duration**: Until the start of your next turn

Gain 3 extra movement.
title: Dash

description:
**Condition**: When you are targeted by an attack or check that you are aware of.

Gain +4 Defense against the attack or check.
title: Defend

description:
**Target**: Any creature that has is Unaware of you, has Obscured vision of you, no light of sight to you, or you have full cover against.

Make a Manipulation vs Insight check against each target. If you are only Obscured from the target then make the check at disadvantage.

*   **Success**: You are hidden from the target.
title: Hide

description:
**Target**: One enemy within reach

Make a Physique vs Tenacity attack against the target.

*   **Hit**: Choose to either push target 1 space or knock target prone.
    
*   **Critical**: You can choose to do both or push the target 2 spaces.
title: Push

description:
**Target**: Single creature within weapon reach/range

Make a Warfare vs Dodge weapon attack against the target.

*   **Hit**: Deal weapon damage.
title: Strike

description:
**Condition**: When you make an attack with a Light or Balanced weapon.

You make an attack or ready a Block with a different Light or Balanced weapon.
title: Offhand Swing

description:
**Condition**: An enemy moves into melee threat range.

Make a Warfare vs Dodge melee weapon attack against the target.

*   **Hit**: Deal weapon damage. For each space the target moved towards, add +1 to the damage roll to a maximum of +4.
title: Brace

description: Make a basic attack with a Heavy Melee weapon. If attack roll has advantage, then the damage roll is boosted for free.
title: Power Attack

description:
**Condition**: You move 3 spaces directly towards a target before making a melee attack.

Either gain Advantage on the attack roll or +3 to the Physical damage roll.
title: Charge

description:
**Target**: Up to 3 different creatures within melee weapon reach.

Make a Warfare vs Dodge melee weapon attack against each target.

*   **Hit**: Deal weapon damage
title: Cleave

description:
**Condition**: You move before making a throw weapon attack.

Increase the range of the attack by twice the number of spaces you moved towards the target.
title: Hurl

description:
**Target**: One creature within Reach

Make a Physique vs Tenacity attack against the target.

*   **Hit**: Knock target prone and push them back up to 2 spaces. As you push the target you shift into their previous space without needing to spend movement.
title: Overrun

description:
**Condition**: After you hit a target with a shield attack or Block a melee attack from a target.

Use the Push (Action) against the target.
title: Shield Slam

description:
**Condition**: You deal Bludgeoning damage to a target with a melee weapon.

Make a Physique vs Fortitude attack against the target.

*   **Hit**: Deal 1 stun
    
*   **Crit**: Deal 2 stun
title: Stunning Blow

description:
**Condition**: You hit with a Light or Balanced weapon

**Duration**: until the start of next turn or until expended.

Gain one of the following:

*   If you hit with a Light weapon the next attack you make with a Balanced weapon has advantage to hit.
    
*   If you hit with a Balanced weapon the next hit you make with a Light weapon has a boosted damage roll.
title: Dual Weapon Mix Up

description:
**Target**: One creature touched.

Make a Physique vs Tenacity attack against the target.

*   **Hit**: Grapple the target
    
*   **Crit**: In addition the target is silenced. This lasts while you are in control of the grapple.
title: Grapple

description:
*   You do not suffer disadvantage for making attacks when prone.
    
*   You retrain your melee threat range while prone.
    
*   Creatures do not gain advantage against you for being prone
title: Groundwork

description:
Make two basic attacks with light weapon(s).

_\*Note: You can either make one attack with two different weapons or two attacks with one weapon._
title: Flurry of Blows

description:
You learn how to make unarmed attack with the following profiles:

*   **Jab**: 2d4 + 1d6 Bashing; Light, Natural
    
*   **Cross**: 3d6 Bashing; Balanced, Natural
    
*   **Kick**: 1d6 + 2d8 Bashing; Heavy, Natural
title: Martial Artist

description:
**Target**: One creature within reach.

Make a Physique vs Tenacity attack against the target.

*   **Hit**: Push the target 1 space or knock them prone. You can Shift directly towards the target.
    
*   **Critical**: Instead push the target up to 2 spaces and you can knock them prone.
title: Bull Rush

description:
**Condition**: You hit the same creature at least 3 times with weapon attacks this turn.

**Duration**: Until the start of your next turn. You can make a single weapon attack against that target with advantage.
title: Overwhelming Assault

description:
**Condition**: You hit with a piercing weapon, the attack was not blocked and you failed to overcome Physical resistance

Deal 1 piercing damage ignoring resistance.
title: Piercing Blow

description: When rolling piercing weapon damage each die that rolls a value of less than half of the sides of the dice is considered to be half the dice sides.
title: Piercing Blow (Alternate)

description:
You ignore cover bonuses for shooting into melee and gain the following:

**Point Blank Shot** _\[Initial Reflex\]_

**Condition**: You make a ranged weapon attack while engaged in melee Ignore Disadvantage from being in melee
title: Precise Shot

description: Reload weapon
title: Rapid Reload

description: Make two ranged weapon attacks.
title: Rapid Shot

description:
Condition: When you make an attack with a ranged weapon while Hidden
Target: Each creature you are Hidden from.
Make a Manipulation vs Insight check with disadvantage against each target. 
  Success: You remain Hidden from the target despite attacking.
title: Snipe

description:
Target: One creature in melee reach
Make a Manipulation vs Tenacity attack against the target. 
  Hit: If the target has no stacks of Shakey then it suffers Shakey. If the target has a stack of Shakey it is expended and the target drops a held item of your choice. If you have a free hand you can take the item.
  Critical: Target drops a held item of your choice. You can choose to knock the item up to 3 spaces away.

Shakey: The next weapon attack the target makes is made with disadvantage then this effect ends.
title: Disarm

description:
Target: One creature within melee reach
Make a Manipulation vs Tenacity attack against the target.
  Hit: Knock the target Prone.
  Critical: In addition target gains 3 stacks of Sluggish
title: Trip

description:
Duration: Until the Start of your next turn or until expended.
Target: One creature within melee weapon reach.
Make a Manipulation vs Insight attack against the target. 
  Hit: The next Melee attack you make against the target is made as though they are unaware of you.
  Crit: Instead all Melee attacks are made as though they are unaware of you.
*When unaware, attacks and checks are made with advantage and the target cannot use reactions against the attack.
title: Feint

description:
**Condition**: You hit with a light melee weapon attack or a ranged weapon attack at a target within range 6. And your attack meets one of the following conditions:

*   The target is unaware of the attack
    
*   The attack roll was made with advantage
    
*   The target is within the threat range of an ally.
    

Deal 1 bonus die of physical damage.
title: Sneak Attack

description:
**Condition**: You must have one hand free.

Make a basic attack with a Light or Balanced weapon. Ready an action to Defend vs Melee Attack.
title: Fencing

description:
**Condition**: A creature misses you with a melee attack.

Make a basic melee attack against the target.
title: Riposte

description:
Condition: Make a weapon attack roll
You can choose to shift 1 space after the attack is resolved
title: Wind Stance

description:
Condition: You hit with a Slashing or Piercing weapon.
Reduce the damage roll by one or more die to a minimum of one (largest size die if mixed pool). If you still deal Slashing or Piercing damage to the target, then they also suffer a number of Bleed stacks based on the class of weapon:
 - Light: 1 Bleed per die
 - Balalnced: 2 Bleed per die
 - Heavy: 3 Bleed per die
title: Let the Blood Flow

description:
Condition: You deal Slashing or Piercing weapon damage to a creature with a hit
Initial: If the triggering attack is a critical you can use this skill as a Reflex.
Deal 3 Bleed to the target. If the triggering attack was a critical deal 6 Bleed stacks instead.
title: Bleeding Attack

description:
Condition: You apply one or more stacks of Bleed with a critical hit
Duration: While the target is still bleeding
The target suffers the following:
 - Direct attacks and Insight rolls made against the target have advantage.
 - Target has disadvantage on the first direct attack they make a turn.
title: Blood in their Eyes

description:
Target: One creature within range 3
Duration: Until the end of the target's turn.
Make a Manipulation vs Insight attack against the target.
  Hit: Target is Blinded. The target or any adjacent creature can use an Action to remove this condition.
  Critical: Instead the Blind lasts until it is removed and a Complex Action is needed to remove it.
title: Dirty Tricks

description:
Condition: Enemy moves adjacent to you
Make a Manipulation vs Insight attack against the target. 
  Hit: You can Shift up to 2 extra spaces. Target is forced to move into your original space.
title: Trick Step

description:
Duration: Indefinite while remaining in the same space, then 5 Minutes after moving
You gain the Camouflage condition.
   - You have advantage on all Stealth checks
You gain the following benefits only while remaining still
   - You are automatically Hidden from any target that did not see you perform this action.
   - Gain +4 bonus on Stealth checks
title: Camouflage

description:
Target: Any creature that is observing you.
Make a Manipulation vs Insight check against each target.
  Success: Conceal a light weapon or small object from the target.
title: Deft Palm

description:
Target: Mechanically locked device or trap within reach
The time taken to perform the action is based on device (common times are listed below).
 - Key Lock: Complex Action
 - Mechanical Trap: 1 Minute
 - Vault: 5 minutes
Make a Manipulation vs Quality check against the target.
  Critical Failure: The device is jammed and you cannot open it until it is repaired.
  Success: Gain 1 step towards disabling the device.
  Critical: Instead, Gain 2 steps twoards disabling the device.

*Locked Devices and Traps have two ratings Quality and Complexity. Quality sets the difficulty of the disable check. Complexity sets the number of successes needed to disable the device.
title: Disable Device

description:
Target: Creature within reach
Make a Manipulation vs Insight check against the target.
  Miss: The target notices the attempt.
  Hit: Take an unattend item from the target or plant an object on the target.
title: Pick Pocket

description: Stealth skills do not cost you extra movment.
title: Quick and Quiet

description: Refresh (round): Ready an action to Hide
title: Sly Footwork

description: You can find traps while moving at a normal pace without penalty.
title: Trapfinding

description:
Condition: A creature you threaten is about to make an attack.
Target: One creature in melee weapon range.
Make a Physique vs Tenacity attack against the target.
  Hit: Target makes the attack with disadvantage.
  Crit: Attack is negated.
title: Bodycheck

description:
Target: One creature you control in a grapple
Make a Physique vs Tenacity attack the target.
   Hit: You can move as part of this hit. You move the target up to 3 spaces as long as it stays within your reach. Deal 2d4 + 1d6 bashing damage, if you moved the target through difficult terrain or an obstacle then deal an extra die of damage.
title: Drag and Smash

description:
Condition: A melee attack hits you.
Make a Physique vs Tenacity attack against the attacker.
  Hit: Grapple the target. If your attack result is equal to or greater than the triggering hit's attack result, then the hit is negated.
title: Grab the Jaws

description:
**Condition**: You are in control of a grapple against the target. Make a Physique vs Tenacity attack against the target. * Hit: Target is Pinned.
Pinned * Target is knocked prone * Target is unable to move * Target can only use the Wrestle skill to end the Pin condition and does not gain any other benefit
title: Pin

description: You can be in control of multiple grapples.
title: Bear Hug

description:
Condition: You Defend against an attack vs Dodge and still get hit.
Refund an action point used to Defend yourself.
title: Combat Expertise

description:
**Refresh** (round): 1 Ward vs Forced Movement

_\*Forced movement includes any effect that would knock you prone._
title: Stable Footing

description:
Condition: You would take damage from an Area attack vs Dodge.
Gain +4 Resistance vs any damage from the attack.
title: Evasion

description:
Condition: You targeted by an Area attack that you are aware of.
Shift 1 extra space. You can choose to Shift up to 2 more spaces. If you end your movement outside of the area you are no longer a target of the triggering attack.
title: Get Clear

description:
Condition: At the start of combat
Add an extra initiative card to the initiative deck. You act at your highest initiative card. (Remove the second card once the order has been revealed.)
title: Improved Initiative

description:
Condition: You are knocked prone, while you are not encumbered.
Alternate Cost: You can choose to spend 3 Movement instead of using an action point
Stand up from prone.
title: Kip-up

description: Increase Walking Speed by 1
title: Mobile

description:
While not encumbered the Dash (reaction) gains the following benefits:
Initial: Gain 3 extra movement
title: Sprinter

description:
Condition: You Defend against a Trap attack and still get hit.
Refund an action point spent to Defend yourself.
title: Trap Sense

description:
Shift up to 3 extra spaces. Make a Physique vs Tenacity check against each creature whose melee threat range you pass through.
  Failure: Target gains adavantage on the next melee attack they make against before the end of their next turn.
  Critical Success: Target suffers disadvantage on the next melee attack they make against you before the end of their next turn.
title: Tumble

description:
Condition: An adjacent ally is hit by a Direct attack
You are hit instead. You can shift into the space of your ally if they are willing. They are shifted into your space without needing to spend movement.
title: Bodyguard

description: You can block attacks that hit adjacent allies.
title: Bulwark

description:
Condition: You Defend against an attack vs Fortitude or Tenacity and still get hit.
Refund an action point used to Defend yourself
title: Dauntless

description:
Condition: You Defend against an attack vs Insight or Resolve and still get hit.
Refund an action point used to Defend yourself.
title: Discerning

description: For every point of Tenacity you have above worn heavy armor's requirement, decrease the Speed penalty by 1 (minimum 0)
title: Heavy Armor Master

description:
Target: One creature that can see or hear you
Duration: Until the start of you next turn.
Make a Physique vs Resolve attack against the target.
  Hit: The target is at disadvantage on any attack that does not target you. 
  Critical: This effect lasts an additional turn.
title: Imposing Presence

description: Increase the max Dodge for worn light armor by 1
title: Light Armor Master

description:
**Refresh** (round):

*   1 stack of Ward vs Stun
    
*   2 stacks of Ward vs Fear
title: Stubborn

description:
Condition: You score a melee critical hit or reduced an enemy to 0 HP with a melee weapon.
Ready an action to use Fear
title: Brutal Intimidation

description:
Target: One creature that can see or hear you.
Make a Manipulation vs Resolve attack against the target.
  Hit: Target suffers 3 Frightened.
  Critical: Target suffers 3 Frightened and 1 Terrified.
title: Demoralize

description:
Target: One creature that can see or hear you.
Make a Physique vs Resolve attack against the target. 
  Hit: Targets suffers 3 Frightened
  Critical: Instead target suffers 3 Frightened and 1 Terrified.
title: Intimidate

description:
Target: creature that is afraid of you.
Make a Physique vs Resolve attack against the target.
  Hit: Target suffers 2 Terrify or 1 Stun.
  Crit: Instead target suffers 2 Terrify and 1 Stun
title: Stare Down

description:
Condition: Creature that is afraid of you and can see or hear you is about to make an attack or check.
Make a Manipulation vs Resolve check against the target.
  Hit: Triggering roll is made with disadvantage
  Crit: Triggering roll is a failure and the results of the action are negated.
title: Undermine

description: As long as you have Thieves tools you can attempt to disable devices of a magical nature.
title: Arcane Short Circuit

description:
**Cost**: 1 Rage (d12)

**Duration**: Until the start of your next turn

**Upkeepable**

You gain the following benefits:

*   You can spend a Rage (d12) to gain advantage or to boost physical damage on melee or thrown attacks.
    
*   Gain +2 to Natural Armor
    
*   You can only use skills with the Rage, Martial, Resistance or Movement keywords or skills with an Innate resourse cost. When your rage ends suffer 1 Stun. Your rage ends if you are ever knocked unconscious.
title: Rage

description:
Cost: 1 Rage (d12)
Target: All enemies with range 24 that can see or hear you
Make a Physique vs Resolve attack against each target.
  Hit: Target gains 2 stacks of Frightened. 
  Critical: Instead gains 2 stacks of Terrified.
title: Howl

description: Gain base Natural Armor of 3
title: Iron Skin

description:
Condition: You are hit by an attack while Raging
Cost: 1 Rage (d12)
Block 4 Physical damage.
title: Only a Flesh Wound

description:
Condition: You would take damage while not Raging.
Immediately enter a Rage without spending the cost. You gain Rage benefits against the triggering attack
title: Taste of my own Blood

description:
Cost: 2 Sanguine (d10)
Target: All creatures in a length 6 Cone or length 12 Line.
Make a Warfare vs Dodge attack against each target.
  Miss: Deal half damage.
  Hit: Deal 3d6 <bloodline element> damage.
title: Draconic Breath Weapon

description: Lean Darkvision, Fly, Magic Weapon, Elemental Protection <bloodline element> as Sponteanous spells. You can use your Sanguine pool in place of mana to cast, gain advantage or boost the damage of these spells.
title: Draconic Magic

description:
Cost: 2 Sanguine (d10)
Target: One creature within range 6
Duration: 5 Minutes or until expended
When casting this spell select one <element> tied to your bloodline. Make a Spirit vs Fortitude attack.
  Hit: Target gains 3 stacks of vulnerability to <element>.
  Crit: Target gains 6 stacks of vulnerability to <element> instead
Vulernability [When you are hit be an attack whose damage matches the vulnerability type]: Deal an extra die of damage and remove a stack of vulnerability.
title: Inflict Vulnerability

description:
Cost: 2 Sanguine (d10)
Duration: 1 Hour
Upkeep 1 Sanguine (d10)
Grow two claws and bite using the below profiles. You can spend Sanguine points to boost damage rolls for them.
 - Claws: 3d6 Slashing damage, Balanced, Natural
 - Bite: 1d6 + 2d8 Piercing damage, Heavy, Natural
title: Natural Ferocity

description: Gain +1 Natural Armor. Gain +3 Resistance vs <element>. Select one element based from your bloodline hertiage. If you have multiple heritages you can adjust this resistance type after finishing a long rest.
title: Protective Hide

description: Learn Entangle, Hideous Laughter, Sleep, Suggestion, Extricate the Senses as Sponteanous spells. You can use your Sanguine pool in place of mana to cast, gain advantage or boost the damage of these spells.
title: Fae Magic

description:
**Condition**: When invisibility would break upon making an attack.

**Cost**: 2 Sanguine (d10) or 1 Mastery (d6)

**Duration**: Until the end of your next turn

You remain invisible until the end of your next turn or you make another attack. Make a Manipulation vs Insight check against all targets that would have had line of sight on you if your Invisibility had ended. Failure: The target sees a glimpse of you as your invisibility flickers momentarily before being restored. Success: The target is unaware of you, from their perspective the invisibility never broke or they did not notice the momentary disruption.
title: Ephemreal Form

description:
**Condition**: You are targeted by an Mental attack

**Cost**: 1 Sanguine (d10)

Defend against the attack
title: Mental Guile

description:
**Cost**: 2 Virtuoso (d6) or 2 Sanguine (d10)

**Duration**: 5 Minutes

**Target**: Up to 3 creatures within range 12, who can hear or see you

Make a Manipulation vs Insight attack against each target.

*   **Hit**: Target suffers the Fascinated condition.
    
*   **Critical**: In addition target is Susceptibility to Manipulation attacks for the duration.
title: Fascinate

description:
**Condition**: When you would move through difficult terrain.

**Cost**: 1 Sanguine (d10) + 2 Sanguine (d10) per charge.

**Duration**: 5 Minutes

You ignore non-magical difficult terrain. If the difficult terrain was created by a spell effect you can ignore it if you spent a number of charges equal or higher than the tier of the spell.
title: Woodland Stride

description:
Cost: 3 Sanguine (d10)
Target: All creatures in a length 4 Line.
Make a Warfare vs Dodge attack against each target.
  Miss: Deal half damage.
  Hit: Deal 3d8 <bloodline element> damage, based on your bloodline hertiage.
title: Elemental Torrent

description:
Target: All allies within 6 spaces.
While within the aura, each target gain:
 - Refresh (round): 1 Ward vs Fear
If the target enters the aura and they do not have a ward from this aura they gain a stack. If they leave the aura they keept the stack until the start of their next turn.
title: Aura of Courage

description:
Refresh (round): 
  - 1 Disease Absorption
  - 1 Poison Absorption
title: Divine Health

description:
Cost: 1 Anoitment (d6)
Duration: 8 Hours
Summon a mount in an empty space adjacent to you. This mount is a construct with a speed of 8 and 5 HP. The mount has the same defenses and Resistances as you. The mount has no action points and one reaction which it can choose to Dash (Reaction) or Defend (Reaction). The mount acts on your turn.
title: Divine Mount

description:
Cost: 1 Anoitment (d6)
Duration: 5 Minutes
Range: 12 space radius centered on you
Target: Any Dragon, Celestial, Fiend or Undead that is not completly obscured by a Mundam Barrier
You learn if there are any of the listed creature types within Range. You do not know their location or numbers but you can tell which types of creatures are present. You can also detect the presence of any area or object that has been consecrated or desecrated within range. You can use the following action during the duration.

Focused Attention (Action)
Duration: Until the start of your next turn.
Select one of the creature types listed above. You can make a Spirit vs Manipulation check against each target to determine its exact location.
title: Divine Sense

description:
Condition: You hit with a weapon attack.
Cost: 1 Anoitment (d6)
Deal 3d6 Radiant damage in addition to the normal weapon damage. If the target is an Undead, Demon, Devil or Dragon then deal 2d8 + 1d10 Radiant damage instead.
title: Smite

description:
**Cost**: 2 Animalism (d10)

**Duration**: Suspend 1 Animalism or until expended.

Select a Wild Shape form you known and transform into it. All of you gear shifts into the animal. You cannot cast spells with Verbal or Somatic message while in animal form. While in animal form you have a hit point pool. You can maintain this form while the pool remains. While you suspend this skill you can revert from and shift back to this form as an action.
title: Wild Shape

description:
HP Pool 8
Walking Speed 6
Climb or Swim Speed 6
Natural Armor 3
Physique 4
Tenacity 2
Dodge 6
 - Claws: 3d6 Slashing damage, Balanced, Natural
 - Bite: 1d6 + 2d8 Piercing damage, Heavy, Natural
title: Small Animal Form

description:
HP Pool 12
Walking Speed 6
Climb or Swim Speed 4
Natural Armor 5
Physique 5
Tenacity 4
Dodge 4
 - Claws: 3d6 Slashing damage, Balanced, Natural
 - Bite: 1d6 + 2d8 Piercing damage, Heavy, Natural
title: Medium Animal Form

description:
HP Pool 15
Walking Speed 5
Climb or Swim Speed 3
Natural Armor 7
Physique 6
Tenacity 7
Dodge 2
 - Claws: 3d6 Slashing damage, Balanced, Natural
 - Bite: 1d6 + 2d8 Piercing damage, Heavy, Natural
title: Large Animal Form

description:
Condition: While in Wild Shape and you Are hit
Cost: 1 Animalism (d10)
Block 4 Physical damage
title: Enduring Form

description: You can spend animalism to gain advantage on natural weapon attacks and to boost natural weapon damage rolls.
title: Feral Form

description:
Condition: You deal damage to a target with a Natural weapon.
Cost: 1 Ki (d8)
Target gains a stack of Susceptible to stun or ready an action to stun the target
title: Disruptive Ki

description:
Cost: 1 Ki (d8)
Jump 6 extra spaces. You can jump as far horizontally as you can vertically.
title: High Jump

description:
As long as your Ki pool maximum is more than zero then your natural attacks are considered magical. You also gain the following:

Penetrating Strike (Reflex)
Condition: You hit a character with Vulnerablity to Silver or Cold-Iron with a Natural weapon.
Cost: 1 Ki (d8)
Duration: 5 Minutes
Your Natural weapons are considered Silver and Cold-Iron.
title: Ki Strike

description:
Condition: You are falling.
Cost: 1 Ki (d8)
Duration: 5 Minutes or until you reach solid ground.
You fall at the rate of 4 spaces per turn and do not take falling damage.
title: Slow Fall

description:
Condition: You are targeted by an attack against your Fortitude, Resolve or Insight
Cost: 1 Ki (d8)
Defend against the attack
title: Purity of Mind and Body

description:
Condition: You are not wearing armor and are not encumbered.
Refresh (Round): Ready an action to Defend against attacks vs Dodge.

Inner Grace [Free Action]
Suspend 2 Ki.
Ready an extra action each round.
title: Unarmored Defense

description:
Cost: 1 Ki (d8)
Target: Self
Heal 4 damage.
title: Wholeness of Body

description: You can use Ki points in place of Mana to cast, gain advantage or boost damage for any spells that are part of this Path.
title: Inner Sight

description:
Cost: 1 Virtuoso (d10) per charge
Duration: 5 minutes or until expended
Target: An ally within 12 spaces that can see or hear you.
You can target a number of allies equal to the charges, they gain a point of Inspiration .
*Inspiration: You can spend a point of Inspiration to re-roll a single die of one roll.
title: Bardic Inspiration

description:
Condition: A creature, who can hear you, within range 12 uses a Verbal skill or spell
Cost: 2 Virtuoso (d10)
Make a Spirit vs Resolve attack against the target.
  Hit: Any attacks or checks related to the skill are made at disadvantage.
  Critical: The skill is negated
title: Countersong

description:
Cost: 3 Virtuoso (d10)
Target: All enemies within range 6
Make a Manipulation vs Resolve attack against each target.
  Hit: Target suffers 1d4 +2 Frightened.
  Critical: Target instead suffers 1d6 + 4 Frightened.
title: Dirge of Doom

description:
Cost: 1 Virtuoso (d10) per target
Target: An ally within 12 spaces that can see or hear you.
Duration: 5 minutes or until discharged
You can choose to gain advantage on a single check or knowledge roll.
title: Inspire Competence

description:
Cost: 2 Virtuoso (d10)
Target: An ally within 12 spaces that can see or hear you.
Target gains 4 stacks of Ward vs Fear
title: Inspire Courage

description:
Cost: 2 Virtuoso (d10)
Target: Single creature within 8 spaces
Duration: 5 Minutes or until expended
Make a Manipulation vs Resolve attack against the target. 
  Hit: The target carries out a simple reasonable suggestion. This effect will end if the target is threatened.
title: Suggestion

description: You can exclude up to 3 targets from an area Channel effect
title: Selective Channeling

description:
Cost: 2 Channel (d8)
Duration: 5 Minutes or until expended
Target: All Creatures within range 6
Make a Spirit vs Resolve attack against each creature
  Hit: Target gains 1 Jinx
  Crit: Target gains 3 Jinx instead
title: Channel Unluck

description:
Condition: A Jinx stack would cause a reroll on a target within range 12
Cost: 1 Channel (d8)
Target rerolls all dice of 4 or higher.
title: Ill Fortunes

description:
Cost: 2 Channel (d8)
Target: One creature within range 6
Duration: 5 minutes or until expended
Make a Manipulation vs Resolve attack against the target.
  - Hit: Target suffers 3 Jinx
  - Crit: Instead target suffers 6 Jinx
title: Evil Eye

description:
Condition: After you make a knoweldge check but before the information is revealed
Duration: While 1 Channel is Reserved
Re-roll any of the dice.
title: Divine Lore

description: Gain +4 expertise ranks
title: Scholarly Training

description: You can use Channel points in place of Mana to cast, gain advantage or boost damage for any spells that are part of a Domain you belong to.
title: Channel Divine Magic

description:
Condition: You heal a character at 0 HP or remove a condition that caused them to lose control
Cost: 1 Channel (d8)
The target stands up from prone. Any items dropped by the target that are not currently wielded are returned to their hands.
title: Breath of Dawn

description:
Cost: 2 Channel (d8)

description:
**Cantrip**

**Duration**: 1 Hour

Create a magical effect as a demonstration of your power. The effects are mostly harmless and do not innately provide any bonuses but situational could help or hinder. The exact effects should be flavored to each character but falls within these bounds. When cast by someone with higher tiers of Mana the effects can be more pronounced. When you cast you pick from one of the following:

*   **Visage**: You imbue yourself with magical energy which can cause your eyes to glow, or your voice to echo, or other minor cosmetic changes to your appearance.
    
*   **Environmental**: You can effect your environment within range 24 . You can cause lights to dim, grow brighter or flicker, unsecured doors or windows to fly open or closed, wind to pick up or die down, the ground or water to shake.
    
*   **Flourish**: You create a small effect within range 6. You might clean away a small bit of dirt or grime, cause an arcane symbol to appear in the air, levitate an object weighting a few ounces a few inches into the air.

description:
Cost: 1 Mana (d10)
Duration: 24 hours or until expended
Upkeepable
Target: A tiny animal within 100 spaces
You can target a specific creature you can see or it will summon the nearest creature of a type you specify or the nearly valid target. The target is compelled to come to you. If there is no creature in range or if they are unable to reach you within 5 minutes the spell fails, but the mana is still expended. You convey a message of up to 25 words to the creature and describe a location and target creature to deliver the message to. The creature makes a progress of up to 25 miles per day, at any point if the animal can fly or swim then it moves at double the distance. Once it reach the location it will wait for recipient and the message is delivered in your voice. If the animal dies or is unable to reach the location or find the target the spell ends. As long as you are on the same plane as the creature you know if the creature is still trying to deliver the message. You also know when the spell ends if the creature was unable to make the journey, died or successfully delivered the message.

Target gains the ability to sense whether or not there is magic present within range 12. This spell cannot detect the presence of Illusion spells of an equal or higher tier. You can use a Complex Action to identify the different auras you sense and what tier they are. If you detect a spell of the same tier or lower you can also determine the school of magic it belongs to. Otherwise the magic is beyond the scope of this spell to analyze. To determine the exact source of a single aura you must use another Complex Action. You then see the source of this aura if it is within range. If the source is outside of your range you detect the direction it is originating from. You might also detect the lingering presence of more potent magics that passed through this area recently.

     Success: You are hit as normal. 
     Failure: The hit is negated and an image is expended.

Target turns Invisible. Invisibility ends when making an attack roll.

description:
Cost: 3 Mana (d10)
Duration: 5 Minutes
Upkeepable
Target: Creature touched
The Target can see invisible or ethereal creatures and objects that are within range 20.
title: See Invisibility

description:
Cost: 3 Mana (d10)
Ritual: 1 Minute, No mana
Duration: 1 Hour
Upkeepable
You can detect the presence of supernatural creatures (Undead, Fae, Magical Beasts, Abominations) that are native to your plane. You sense whether or not such creatures are within range 12. You cannot detect creatures that under a Masking effect of an equal of higher tier. You can use a Complex Action to determine the number and kind of creatures you sense. You can select one creature and use a Complex Action to pinpoint their position.

Based on the tier you gain the following:
 - Initiate: You can detect supernatural creatures (Undead, Fae, Magical Beasts, Abominations) that are native to your plane.
 - Journeyman: You can detect supernatural creatures from any plane. You can also detect the follow creatures native to your plane (Dragons, Couatls, Outsiders)
 - Master: You can detect the creatures regardless of plane of origin.
title: Sense Supernatural

description:
Cost: 3 Mana (d10)
Duration: Until the start of your next turn
Upkeep: 1 Mana (d10)
Target: Self
Your physical form begins to sparticaly blink back forth between the material plane and ethereal plane. When a Phase Shift roll is called make a luck roll difficulty 11. On a successfull check you are shifted back and forth between the ethereal and material planes. When moving between planes you return to the space you previous occupied or the nearest unoccupied space. If the spell ends you are returned to the material plane (or ethereal if that was the plane where you started on). You gain the following:
 - Refresh (round): You return to the material plane (or ethereal as noted above), you can choose to try to return to a, unoccupied space within range 2 of where you left.
 - Blink: [Trigger] At the end of your turn or when you are hit by an attack, make a Phase Shift roll. On success you count as an ethereal creature for the purpose of determining the effects of the attack.*

* Mudane weapons and affects cannot affect ethereal. Magical Weapons and Spells deal half damage to ethereal creatures.Ghost Touch and Force damage deal full damage to ethereal creatures.
title: Blink

description:
Cost: 3 Mana (d10)
Duration: 5 Minute or until expended
Refresh: You can spend 1 Mana (d10) to regain 3 meteors
Target: Self
Conjure 4 meteors that orbit you, you can have a maximum of 6 meteors. While the spell is active you have the following actions available to you.
 - Throw Meteor (Action) [Spell, Conjuration, Projectile] Target: One creature within 18 spaces. Expend a meteor to make a Warfare vs Dodge attack against the target. Hit: Deal 3d6 Bashing damage.
 - Deflect Hit (Initial Reflex) [Spell, Conjuration, Block] Condition: You are hit by an attack you are aware of. Gain 4 Physical block against the triggering hit.

description:
Cost: 3 Mana (d10)
Teleport to an open space within range 6.

Cost: 3 Mana (d10)

Gain Darkvision range 12.

When you cast this still, when a creature enters or when they end their turn in the area make a Spirit vs Tenacity attack against them. The area of the spell is treated as difficult terrain*.
  Hit: Target is restrained.
  Crit: In addition target suffers 6 Sluggish.

description:

Target is locked for a duration of your choosing or permanently. When you cast this spell you can designate a command word which unlocks the target (it will relock when closed). You can also designate a number of creatures that can open the target without issue. Attempts to pick the lock with mundane tools are made at disadvantage against the Persistence of this spell.

description:
**Condition**: When a creature, you are aware of, within range 24 casts a spell

**Cost**: 3 Mana (d10) + 1 Mana (d10) per charge

If you did not spend any Mana of the same or higher tier of the spell being cast your counter attempt fails. Make a Spirit vs Resolve dispel attack against the target. If you spent less Mana than the target spent to cast then you make the roll with disadvantage. If you spent more Mana than you make the roll with advantage.

*   Miss: The counter attempts fails.
    
*   Hit: The target's spell is negated.
    
*   Critical: Additionally the Target suffers Severe Drain for the countered spell.
    

_\*Severe Drain: When rolling for Drain you re-roll any dice that failed to cause Drain_
title: Counterspell

Duration: 1 Hour
Upkeep: 2 Mana (d10)

Counters: Light spells

Natural Darkvision or Darkvision granted by a spell of the same tier or lower cannot see through this darkness. Creatures standing on the boundary of the effect gain the benefit of light cover.
*Note: Cantrip light spells are always considered to be a lower tier and as such are dispel by Darkness.

description:

 *Note: Non-area attacks that target Dodge or Tenacity are normally considered Direct Attacks

Duration: 1 Hour
Target: Self
Change your appearance to appear as a different creature. Your clothes and armor change to appear however you want. The illusion can make you appear one foot taller or shorter than you and as thin or fat as you want. Your illusion must maintain your same basic body type. If any creature physically interacts with you make a Manipulation vs Insight check. On success they do not notice the illusion. On failure they see through the illusion. You suffer disadvantage on this check if the illusion has particular exaggerations.

When the target would take damage, they take the half the damage rounded down. You take the remaining damage.

Divination spells of the same tier you cast this spell as are Negated against you. Divination spells one tier higher have disadvantage on attacks or checks made against you. Higher tier Divination spells are unaffected.

The target can respond with a message of the same length. You and target do not need to speak a shared language, the meaning of your messages are conveyed mentallly. The other three senses do not have an associated condition tied to their removal. If they are removed the extent of the effect is left to the DM's discression. On a critical you can select any two senses to remove.

Otherwise they continue to attack what they were last attacking then attack the nearest hostile creature. If you control multiple Animated Dead they all act on the same initiative. You can have as many copies of this spell active as you can afford.

Action Points: 1 
HP: 15, Constitution: 1
Phys +2, War +3, Spirit -2, Manip -2
Dodge 12, Tenacity 12, Fortitude 9, Resolve 15, Insight 5
Resistance: Phys 8 (Slashing 12), Energy 3 (Fire 0, Cold 6), Essence 5 (Immune Psionic, Radiant 0)
Immune: Mental

Claw (Natural Melee Weapon): 2d4+1d6 Slashing damage

description:
Cost: 4 Mana (d10)
Duration: Until the end of the target's next turn.
Target: A creature within range 12
Make a Spirit vs Resolve attack against the target.
  Hit: On the target's next turn they are compelled to follow a single word command. The target will use their movement and at most one action point to accomplish the task. Once the target completes the task their turn ends. Any one word command may be used but common commands are listed below. If the command would cause the creature direct harm then this effect is negated. If the target does not understand the command word, then it suffers 1 Stun and can act normally. 
 - Approach: Target moves directly towards you.
 - Drop: Target drops a held object.
 - Flee: Target moves away from you.
 - Grovel: Target drops prone.
 - Halt: Target does nothing on their turn.

  Crit: That spell or effect cannot be reactived until the start of your next turn.

Hit/Willing: Select one of the following Shapeshifting effects to apply to the target:

 - Reduce: Suffer -2 Physique, -2 Tenacity, +2 Dodge and -2 Melee Damage. Decrease size by one category.
*Note: Creatures can only have 1 Shapeshifting effect on them at a time.

*Inspiration: You can spend a point of Inspiration to re-roll a single die of one roll.

description:
Cost: 5 Mana (d10)
Duration: 1 Round
Upkeep: 2 Mana (d10)
Target: Circle of radius 1 space with the center placed within 2 spaces.
The circles protective power only applies to Magical or Supernatural creatures or attacks. When you cast this spell you select either Sealing or Warding. A Sealing circle restricts creatures inside of it from attacking or leaving the circle. A Warding circle protects those inside the circle from creatures attacking or entering it.

A creature is considered Mystical if it has a Mana or Resonance pool, Has innate Supernatural or Spell abilities, or is under the affect of something Supernatural or Magical in nature. An attack is considered Mystical if it made by a Magic weapon, with Magic ammo, is a natural weapon of a Mystical creature, or is a Spell or Supernatural attack.

Barrier [Trigger]
Condition: When a mystical creature tries to move through the circle or a mystical attack is made across the circle in the direction that is being protected against.
Make a Spirit vs Resolve attack.
  Hit: Triggering attack is negated or triggering movement is prevented. Until the start of the target's next turn they must spend 3 movement to attempt to move through the circle.
  Crit: Triggering creature suffers 1 stun in addition to other effects.

description:

Acid Burn [Trigger]
Condition: At the start of the target's turn
A stack is expended and the target is dealt 3d4 Acid damage.

description:
Cost: 8 Mana (d10)
Target: One dead creature
If the ressurection is successful the creature single point of constitution, half hit points (rounded up) and no resources. To Resurrect a creature you must meet all of the following conditions: 
 - The majority of the target's body must be in tact (greater than 50%).
 - The creature must have died within the past 7 days.
 - The creature was not killed by Necromancy effect and its soul/essence has not been captured.
 - The creature's soul must be willing to return to life.

Journeyman: You can more easily resurrect creatures, select one of the following to override a requirement or give additional benefit:
  - The target can be resurrected with only a small portion of the body (head, limb, hand, skeleton)
  - The target can be resurrected if they died within the past 3 months.
  - The target can be resurrected if the soul is lost or was affected by a Necromancy effect of a lower tier then this spell.
  - The target is resurrected at half constitution (rounded up), full HP and with 3 resource points in pools of their choice.

Master: You gain the benefit from the Journeyman tier and additionally gain one of the following:
  - The target can be resurrected without any remains, so long as the caster is familiar with the creature (meet them, has their true name and date of birth, has a close friend or relative present)
  - The target can be resurrected if they died within the past 10 years.
  - The target can be resurrected if the soul is imprisoned or was killed by a Master tier Necromancy effect. In this case this spell inflicts critical drain and you must make a Spirit vs Persistence against the Necromancy or Imprisonment effect.
  - The target is resurrected with full constitution, full HP and with 6 resource points in pools of their choice.
title: Resurrection
